entry.title: crushing
entry.summary:
Author: sopharou

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,367Chapters: 1/2Kudos: 0

Summary: "Whatever happened in Metropolis three months ago- I need you to wrap it up. It makes you a goddamn liability.""You think I don't know that?" Clark's voice is hoarse. Low. "You think I wanted this to happen?"Dark eyes watch Clark."I'm not trying to be your weak link, Batman. I'm trying to survive it."

entry.title: Temptation is One Hell of a Thing
entry.summary:
Author: acatcam

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,031Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 6

Summary: Bruce Wayne never expected to walk into a church again—let alone with his four-year-old son in his arms. But when a meeting with Father Kent turns into more than polite conversation, Bruce finds himself disarmed by a man who shouldn’t have surprised him at all. Clark is broad-shouldered, and impossibly kind; a believer in things Bruce turned his back on the day of his parents’ funeral.Bruce is skeptical, Clark is steadfast. Their ideologies clash from the moment they sit across from one another: billionaire pragmatism versus the faith of a Father. But somewhere between coloring books at Clark’s desk and quiet invitations to community fairs, a dangerous warmth grows. Bruce doesn’t know how to name it, and Clark doesn’t dare.Because whatever is happening between them—it shouldn’t. Bruce pushes, searching for the language he can’t bring himself to say aloud, while Clark whispers what he shouldn’t confess at all: I can’t. A vow binds him to the Church, but his heart betrays him in every secret meeting, every glance held too long.It shouldn’t work. It can’t work. But it does. And as much Father Kent prays, temptation seeps through.

entry.title: Lavender Marriage
entry.summary:
Author: TheBobblehat

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 49,900Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 277

Summary: Lex Luthor has sponsored the new wing of the Metropolis Science Museum, and Clark and Bruce both suspect foul play. While in the geology exhibit, they discover an unknown strand of kryptonite, which cripples Clark almost immediately. Bruce drags him away, but just as they're catching their breath, a mysterious gunman fires on Clark from the shadows, piercing his heart with a bullet, specially made from Luthor's new find.Bruce gets Clark to a safe house and manages to extract the bullet, but not before saving Clark from its strange effects. When he wakes up, Clark recognizes Bruce. But not as his caped companion, or a fellow member of the League. They aren't competitors, allies, or even just friends.According to Clark, Bruce Wayne is his husband.

entry.title: World's Finest
entry.summary:
Author: Salamence_373

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,315Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 32

Summary: Clark is new to Metropolis after landing his dream job as a journalist at the Daily Planet that's in a frenzy covering the new hero Superman that's moved to town. Bruce has been fighting as Batman for three years but still has a long way to go juggling his double life. These two have been searching for meaning as they strive towards their ultimate goals on an inevitable collision course. Their rivalry sparks new passion from both of them as they find out they aren't so different after all, while finding what's been missing from their lives. They each bring out the best in each other and make them better heroes and people as they build for a better tomorrow.

entry.title: I've Got All This Ringing In My Ears And None On My Fingers
entry.summary:
Author: saintsforgrrrls

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 28,479Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 144

Summary: Music matches your soul. Bruce hates his own tune while Clark finds it as the most beautiful thing to bless his ears.-----Hal’s hand mocked him, his thumb and the rest of his fingers imitating John’s mouth. “Big Blue’s Kryptonian traditional crystal music. That’s a mouthful. Princess, over there, has a crazy opera gig going on.” He explained, pointing at everyone who stood around the Green Lanterns.Barry and Bruce were the outliers, choosing to continue sitting at the table. Or rather, Bruce was sitting in the chair while Barry sat on top of the large circular table near him while emitting his music. He didn’t want to be mean and leave Bruce at the table by himself.“Fish boy has a whole...whale? Which is crazy considering he already controls most of the ocean so the sound is really on the nose-“ Hal began to ramble off to himself, absentmindedly waving his hand as he motioned John to continue it for him.

Author: sunlightatdawn

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,202Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 4

Summary: “Hi handsome.” He says and I tip my head down barely, something he really hates, but he leans in and kisses me anyway. It’s not anything fancy, just a quick peck, something that I wish lasted longer- but I let him pull away, busing myself with telling him what I’m planning for tonight. I do really hope he likes it. “I haven’t started cooking, so I thought we could..” I somehow manage to cut myself off, kissing him again, leaving myself grinning like mad. Christ, I love him.“Is someone being romantic?” He mumbles against my lips, standing in place, letting me wrap my hands around his waist without quarrel. Even beneath the ridiculous coat, I can still make out the vague outline of his body against mine- the same that I absentmindedly map out when we cuddle. I can’t help but grin, letting out a little laugh before pulling away. “Maybe I am.”“You should start wearing your glasses on patrol more often.” His hands linger around my glasses for a while, before pulling away properly. I hate when he does this, because he knows I can’t resist doing what he wants, just to impress him. I might look into some blue-light glasses or something I can wear more often. They can’t be too expensive can they?

entry.title: Calling for Superman
entry.summary:
Author: Speechless_since_1998

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,654Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 235

Summary: “Do you want to go out with Bruce?” Dick asked point-blank, being looked at by the hero as if the alien between them was the child.“What…”“Bruce obviously likes you, otherwise he wouldn't have spent time with you, not even to test a theory, and he was happy to be in your company! He can't stand people, except me and Alfred! You're special!" (In which Dick meets his favorite hero and plays matchmaking. After all, who wouldn't want Superman as a stepfather?)
